entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning early this evening then changing to flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
